channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Guest posting / Frontend Posting wordpress plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Guest posting / Frontend Posting wordpress plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-1982|2024-08-02T06:05:27.087Z -- unknown -- guest%20posting%20%2F%20frontend%20posting%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Front Editor WordPress plugin through 4.0.4 does not sanitize and escape some of its form settings, which could allow high-privilege users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
